snippet: Danny Kuo, a former research analyst, pleaded guilty to criminal charges in an insider-trading case that federal prosecutors have described as a "circle of friends" who together earned about $62 million in illegal gains in Dell stock.
abstract: Danny Kuo, a former research analyst, pleaded guilty to criminal charges in an insider-trading case that federal prosecutors have described as a "circle of friends" who together earned about $62 million in illegal gains in Dell stock.

headline.main: Former Analyst Pleads Guilty in Dell Insider Trading Case
headline.print_headline: Former Analyst Admits Role In Insider Trading Ring
